verbose_text: In particular, phosphorylation of the ser 727 site by several serine kinases, such as mammalian target of rapamycin, protein kinase C (PKC) delta, cyclin dependent kinase 5, and PKC-epsilon, determines the maximal transcriptional activity of STAT3 [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: phosphorylation of the ser-727 site by several serine kinases, such as mammalian target of rapamycin, protein kinase C (PKC) delta, cyclin
